parameters.name: IdName
parameters.description: Light source ID name

parameters.name: LType
parameters.description: Light source type; valid types are taken from openGL definitions (LIGHT_EYE, LIGHT_AMBIENT, LIGHT_SPOT, LIGHT_POINT, LIGHT_DISTANT)

parameters.name: Diff
parameters.description: Light source diffuseness where values range from 0 to 1

parameters.name: RgbColor
parameters.description: Color value

parameters.name: Dist
parameters.description: Distance between the light source position and the vertex

parameters.name: DirX
parameters.description: X unit vector value describing the lights position

parameters.name: DirY
parameters.description: Y unit vector value describing the lights po

parameters.name: DirZ
parameters.description: Z unit vector value describing the lights position

parameters.name: SpotDirX
parameters.description: Spot X direction

parameters.name: SpotDirY
parameters.description: Spot Y direction

parameters.name: SpotDirZ
parameters.description: Spot Z direction

parameters.name: SpotAngle
parameters.description: Spot angle

parameters.name: FallOff0
parameters.description: Light source falloff - constant attenuation NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: FallOff1
parameters.description: Light source falloff - linear attenuation NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: FallOff2
parameters.description: Light source falloff - quadratic attenuation NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: Ambient
parameters.description: Light source ambient intensity

parameters.name: Specular
parameters.description: Light source specular intensity

parameters.name: SpotExponent
parameters.description: Spot exponent NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: BDisable
parameters.description: Light source disabled

title: IModelDoc2.SetLightSourcePropertyValuesVB
description: Sets the light source property values.
signature:
System.Boolean SetLightSourcePropertyValuesVB( 
   System.String
IdName
,
   System.Int32
LType
,
   System.Double
Diff
,
   System.Int32
RgbColor
,
   System.Double
Dist
,
   System.Double
DirX
,
   System.Double
DirY
,
   System.Double
DirZ
,
   System.Double
SpotDirX
,
   System.Double
SpotDirY
,
   System.Double
SpotDirZ
,
   System.Double
SpotAngle
,
   System.Double
FallOff0
,
   System.Double
FallOff1
,
   System.Double
FallOff2
,
   System.Double
Ambient
,
   System.Double
Specular
,
   System.Double
SpotExponent
,
   System.Boolean
BDisable
)

parameters.name: IdName
parameters.description: Light source ID name

parameters.name: LType
parameters.description: Light source type; valid types are taken from openGL definitions (LIGHT_EYE, LIGHT_AMBIENT, LIGHT_SPOT, LIGHT_POINT, LIGHT_DISTANT)

parameters.name: Diff
parameters.description: Light source diffuseness where values range from 0 to 1

parameters.name: RgbColor
parameters.description: Color value

parameters.name: Dist
parameters.description: Distance between the light source position and the vertex

parameters.name: DirX
parameters.description: X unit vector value describing the lights position

parameters.name: DirY
parameters.description: Y unit vector value describing the lights po

parameters.name: DirZ
parameters.description: Z unit vector value describing the lights position

parameters.name: SpotDirX
parameters.description: Spot X direction

parameters.name: SpotDirY
parameters.description: Spot Y direction

parameters.name: SpotDirZ
parameters.description: Spot Z direction

parameters.name: SpotAngle
parameters.description: Spot angle

parameters.name: FallOff0
parameters.description: Light source falloff - constant attenuation NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: FallOff1
parameters.description: Light source falloff - linear attenuation NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: FallOff2
parameters.description: Light source falloff - quadratic attenuation NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: Ambient
parameters.description: Light source ambient intensity

parameters.name: Specular
parameters.description: Light source specular intensity

parameters.name: SpotExponent
parameters.description: Spot exponent NOTE: This parameter is not supported in SOLIDWORKS 2011 and later.

parameters.name: BDisable
parameters.description: Light source disabled

returns: True if setting the light source properties is successful, false if not
remarks:
This method is similar to
IModelDoc2::LightSourcePropertyValues
and
IModelDoc2::ILightSourcePropertyValues
, except using this method you can pass each argument individually.
